timeline.author: netroms

timeline.bodyText:
The username string would go directly into the query from UserCredentials uc where uc.username = :username. Have we already had sql escape somewhere in the api ?
e.g. what if username string =  (select username from users order by lastlogin desc limit 1)
timeline.author: vietnguyen

replies.bodyText:
Good point. We retrieve user credentials in HibernateUserCredentialsStore using a Hibernate Query with named parameters, where parameters are automatically SQL-sanitized by the JDBC driver.
https://software-security.sans.org/developer-how-to/fix-sql-injection-in-java-hibernate
replies.author: larshelge
